reviews.review: I love this game!
rejerqd

The better than GO, Better than 1.6. Better than CZ.

The best CS game.
Do I even need to explain why?

This game is the pinnacle of the Counter-Strike series. It's old so it doesn't get updates anymore so no buffs or nerfs. Good graphics for a 2004 game. Aged well and still played despite Global Offensive. The audio sound so classic and nostalgic. I wished I was born earlier, and had Steam earlier so I could play this when it came out in 2004 when it was the most relevant. And unlike Global Offensive, you only need to spend $20 USD (I bought mine in a bundle which was on sale), where in Global Offensive, you spend over hundreds of units of currency( depending what country you're from)on skins, sprays, passes, music, etc.  So even though this game's a piece of history, can run well, fun to play, and one of Valve's finest and greatest masterpieces, even before Call of Duty, Battlefield, Assassin's Creed etc. was even relevant. Play this game, it's an all time classic.
For a 13 year old game it's pretty freakin awesome, GO is good too but this is good for a change once in a while
its aight i guess
Nice for bhop and solid mechanics. Fluid gameplay.

i played this game since i was 5 and i enjoyed every second of my life playing this game.

this is and old school shooter with maybe not the "best" graphic like cs:go  or other games, but this game brings you memmories from the past and gives you a lot of good time without any shitty overpriced "skins" or "ranks".

i truly reccomend this game to every person who was born before 2004 and likes shooter games like me, and a person who doesnt care about the good graphic and enjoys the game by good memmorie and multiplayer with adult people.

Better than csgo.

Originally got this for the Garry's Mod textures a while back, but after I started playing this with my friend recently, I decided that it's not only the best tactical shooter to play but it's also the best Counter-Strike game compared to the other games, particularly because the movement just feels more natural. However, lately my biggest complaint is that even though I set the settings to place bots in when I make my own server, they never show up. This is especially disappointing since I planned this to train for the next time I play with my friends.
